reward_html:
Glyphic Prophecy Wand

name: The Arena Champion
reward_html:
[[Map]]

flavour_html:
I gave my mind without a fight,
The twelfth hour I lost control.
The day is gone but there is light,
eyes that glow like red-hot coal.

name: The Artist
reward_html:
Level 4 Enhance
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: "Paint, metal, flesh... A true artist does not limit himself." - Malachai the Soulless

name: The Aspirant
reward_html:
Item
Elevated Item
Influenced Item
flavour_html:
Those Exiles that survive Wraeclast
dream not of home, but of power.

name: The Astromancer
reward_html:
[[File: The Eternity Shroud inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[The Eternity Shroud|The Eternity Shroud]][[File: The Eternity Shroud inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
They would say that he was a dangerous man,
unbound by the sense of morality,
but what does this matter,
when his love for humanity is undeniable
and completion of his work would benefit everyone?

name: The Avenger
reward_html:
[[File: Mjlner inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Mjlner|Mjlner]][[File: Mjlner inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
Justice comes swift
Equal to the crime
Revenge is a gift
Life for a life
Eye for an eye

name: The Awakened
reward_html:
Jewellery
Item Level: 86
Double-Influenced Item
flavour_html: Some seek to change the world. Others change the world as a consequence of what they seek.

name: The Bargain
reward_html: Flawless Breachstone
flavour_html: In the pursuit of power, as in that of wealth, anything goes.

name: The Battle Born
reward_html: Axe
flavour_html: "No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"

name: The Bear Woman
reward_html:
Fecund Ursine Pelt
Warlord Item
flavour_html:
For the blessed bear in the cave,
A hundred days pass in silence and darkness,
until moon begins its fourth passage,
the bear sheds her beastly fur,
and is reborn, human and whole.

name: The Beast
reward_html: [[File: Belly of the Beast inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Belly of the Beast|Belly of the Beast]][[File: Belly of the Beast inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: To know the monster, you must become the monster.

flavour_html: It's sad times we live in when a friendship has a price people are willing to pay.

name: The Bitter Blossom
reward_html:
Level 21 Chaos Gem
Quality: +23%
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: The pain you feel is of no consequence, it is evolution, to be made whole within something greater.

name: The Blazing Fire
reward_html: [[File: Chin Sol inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Chin Sol|Chin Sol]][[File: Chin Sol inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

name: The Blessing of Moosh
reward_html:
Level 21 Transfigured Gem
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: While the Labyrinth traps have claimed countless adventurers, they were not designed with felines in mind.

name: The Body
reward_html: [[Body Armour]]
flavour_html: They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.

name: The Bones
reward_html:
Level 21 Vaal Summon Skeletons
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: The flesh is a prison, and we are finally free.

name: The Brawny Battle Mage
reward_html:
Merciless Tornado Wand
Item Level: 100
flavour_html: A humble piece of wood offers the simplest solution to life's problems: just hit them really, really hard.

name: The Breach
reward_html: Breach Item
flavour_html: Ever get the feeling you're being watched...?

name: The Brittle Emperor
reward_html:
[[File: Voll's Devotion inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Voll's Devotion|Voll's Devotion]][[File: Voll's Devotion inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
"When Voll spared Malachai, accepting his aid in pursuit of Purity, the strongest faith was infected by Corruption and made brittle as glass."
- Victario, the People's Poet

name: The Cache
reward_html: Jewellery
flavour_html:
Vintage or crafted, Glittering and shiny
Dusty or glittering, huge or tiny
Secured within a chest
or unearthed from your mining
Find jewellery everywhere,
no need for divining!
So why is it so hard
to figure out which one to wear?
This one makes me stronger,
but does it match my hair?

name: The Cacophony
reward_html: 3x Deafening Essence
flavour_html: Nothing can be heard above the din or seen amongst the turmoil. The senses are shattered. All is left to fate.

name: The Calling
reward_html: Beyond Item
flavour_html: Blood flows not just through veins, but through worlds.

name: The Card Sharp
reward_html: [[Divination Scarab (disambiguation)|Divination Scarab]]
flavour_html: "The house always wins... except when I do."

name: The Carrion Crow
reward_html: Life Armour
flavour_html:
From death, life.
From life, death.
The wheel turns,
and the corbies wheel overhead.

name: The Cartographer
reward_html: 10x [[File: Cartographer's Chisel inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Cartographer's Chisel|Cartographer's Chisel]][[File: Cartographer's Chisel inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
My son, you lost your way before you arrived.
To never lose you again,
I make a path in my heart.

name: The Cataclysm
reward_html:
Level 21 Spell Gem
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: The mighty warriors traded in blows, the nimble archers in arrows, yet it was the brazen thaumaturgists who would bring catastrophe to all.

name: The Catalyst
reward_html: [[File: Vaal Orb inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Vaal Orb|Vaal Orb]][[File: Vaal Orb inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Simple actions can lead the world to an early grave.

name: The Catch
reward_html:
[[Fishing Rod]]
Incubated
Item Level: 99
flavour_html: The largest hooks offer the greatest catch, but often the catch is the hook.

name: The Celestial Justicar
reward_html: Six-Link Astral Plate

name: The Celestial Stone
reward_html:
[[Opal Ring]]
Item Level: 100
Shaper Item
flavour_html: Stare into its depths too long, and you may lose yourself entirely.

name: The Chains that Bind
reward_html: Six-Link Body Armour
flavour_html: Scarier than any criminal is an innocent man in chains, for when he breaks free, his revenge will be justified.

name: The Cheater
reward_html:
Level 6 Awakened Support Gem
Quality: +20%
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Sometimes the best way to achieve greatness is to use a shortcut.

name: The Chosen
reward_html:
[[File: Skin of the Lords inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Skin of the Lords|Skin of the Lords]][[File: Skin of the Lords inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: They whose lives were given to clothe the Dark Dreamer... They were the lucky ones.

name: The Coming Storm
reward_html: [[File: Lightning Coil inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Lightning Coil|Lightning Coil]][[File: Lightning Coil inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

name: The Conduit
reward_html: [[File: Doryani's Fist inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Doryani's Fist|Doryani's Fist]][[File: Doryani's Fist inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

name: The Craving

flavour_html: What was once a passing thought tickling the back of the mind is now a desperate, driving desire.

name: The Cursed King
reward_html: [[File: Rigwald's Curse inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Rigwald's Curse|Rigwald's Curse]][[File: Rigwald's Curse inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

The First Ones
may be blasphemy,
but they are
powerful blasphemy.

name: The Damned
reward_html: [[File: Soul Ripper inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Soul Ripper|Soul Ripper]][[File: Soul Ripper inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
Souls along a conduit of blood,
from one vessel to the next.

name: The Dapper Prodigy
reward_html:
Six-Link Body Armour
Item Level: 100

name: The Dark Mage
reward_html:
Six-Link Staff
Item Level: 55
flavour_html:
With staff in hand
and wrath in heart,
your soul and corpse
shall surely part.

[[File: Severed in Sleep inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Severed in Sleep|Severed in Sleep]][[File: Severed in Sleep inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: A dream from which you cannot awake is nothing other than a nightmare.

name: The Deal
reward_html: [[Cartography Scarab (disambiguation)|Cartography Scarab]]

[[File: Belt of the Deceiver inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Belt of the Deceiver|Belt of the Deceiver]][[File: Belt of the Deceiver inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]

flavour_html: "The Seas Call, the Mad Answer"

name: The Demon

[[File: Headhunter inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Headhunter|Headhunter]][[File: Headhunter inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]

[[File: Watcher's Eye inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Watcher's Eye|Watcher's Eye]][[File: Watcher's Eye inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]

[[File: Mirror Arrow inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Mirror Arrow|Mirror Arrow]][[File: Mirror Arrow inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

name: The Dragon

Scaly beast of the skies,
watching with his golden eyes.
Shadow that blocks out the sun,
it's too late for you to run.

reward_html:
Level 4 Empower
[[Corrupted]]

A dark note drips
from the dreamer's lips,
A honeyed melody.
We stand, we fall
on his beck and call,
for in his dream we're free.

name: The Dungeon Master
reward_html:
[[Belt]]
Double-Influenced Item

name: The Easy Stroll
reward_html:
[[Map]]
Map Tier: 15
Modifiers: 8
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
"I'm going for a walk. I'll be back soon."

- Blonca's last words

name: The Eldritch Decay
reward_html: Uber Elder Fragment

name: The Emptiness
reward_html:
[[File: Vaal Breach inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Vaal Breach|Vaal Breach]][[File: Vaal Breach inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
Quality: +6%
[[Corrupted]]

name: The Encroaching Darkness
reward_html:
[[Map]]
[[Corrupted]]

name: The Endless Darkness
reward_html: [[File: Voidforge inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Voidforge|Voidforge]][[File: Voidforge inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

name: The Endurance
reward_html: Vivid Crimson Jewel

Crimson rubies, drops of vigour,
flowing through my veins,
flesh like coal, try to crush me,
diamond is what remains.

reward_html:
Spiked Gloves of the Conquest (Culling Strike)
Item Level: 86
Warlord Item
flavour_html:
"Boss said to get rid of him, didn't say not to make a mess."
- Rune The Goon

name: The Enlightened
reward_html: Level 3 Enlighten
flavour_html:
Weaving the six,
a serpent stands tall.
Wearing a crown,
the thousand petals call.

name: The Enthusiasts
reward_html:
[[File: Victario's Influence inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Victario's Influence|Victario's Influence]][[File: Victario's Influence inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
"Glimmers of benevolence,
Shrouded a lacquered lust for power,
Yet still they followed his influence."

name: The Escape
reward_html: [[File: Seven-League Step inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Seven-League Step|Seven-League Step]][[File: Seven-League Step inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

name: The Eternal War

[[File: Timeless Jewel inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Timeless Jewel|Timeless Jewel]][[File: Timeless Jewel inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: They believed, falsely, that the strongest of generals could outlast eons of corruption.

name: The Ethereal
reward_html: Six-Link Vaal Regalia
flavour_html:
"Long ago, people looked to the stars, believing they influenced us. Soon, it will be us who influence the stars."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturge

name: The Explorer
reward_html:
[[Map]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: A map is only useful if you know where you stand.

name: The Eye of Terror

flavour_html: The Lord of Chaos dreams as his Eye gazes, unblinking, at his prize. And soon, all shall tremble before his waking form.

name: The Eye of the Dragon
reward_html:
[[Jewel]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
Some powers are far too great even for the
gods of old.

name: The Fathomless Depths
reward_html: [[File: Lightpoacher inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Lightpoacher|Lightpoacher]][[File: Lightpoacher inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Fall into endless night; a voyage into an ocean of oblivion.

name: The Feast
reward_html:
[[File: Romira's Banquet inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Romira's Banquet|Romira's Banquet]][[File: Romira's Banquet inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Shame what happened to my husband. He had such good taste.

name: The Fiend
reward_html:
[[File: Headhunter inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Headhunter|Headhunter]][[File: Headhunter inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
Your era is now,
your power unwavered,
soon we will see
who the gods truly favoured.

name: The Finishing Touch
reward_html: 1x [[File: Fertile Catalyst inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Fertile Catalyst|Fertile Catalyst]][[File: Fertile Catalyst inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: A little extra flair never hurts.

name: The Fishmonger
reward_html: [[File: Albino Rhoa Feather inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Albino Rhoa Feather|Albino Rhoa Feather]][[File: Albino Rhoa Feather inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: However vicious Rhoas might be, a dedicated angler may in time tame them.

name: The Fletcher
reward_html:
[[File: Drillneck inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Drillneck|Drillneck]][[File: Drillneck inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Let these fine arrows pack a punch.

name: The Flora's Gift
reward_html:
Five-Link Staff
Item Level: 66
flavour_html:
Sturdy and strong,
grown from the stream.
The Flora that live here,
A combatant's dream.

name: The Fool
reward_html: 20x [[File: Orb of Chance inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Orb of Chance|Orb of Chance]][[File: Orb of Chance inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Even the most learned man is a fool to his own fate.

name: The Forgotten Treasure
reward_html:
[[Leather Belt]]
Double-Influenced Item
flavour_html: Don't let fool's gold deceive you.

name: The Formless Sea
reward_html: [[File: Varunastra inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Varunastra|Varunastra]][[File: Varunastra inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
Formless might,
Wild beauty tamed,
The brine of gods,
The seas restrained.

name: The Forsaken
reward_html: [[File: Umbilicus Immortalis inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Umbilicus Immortalis|Umbilicus Immortalis]][[File: Umbilicus Immortalis inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: You gave us life and love, more than you could spare. Now you're gone, and we are stranded, alone, cold and without purpose.

name: The Fortunate
reward_html: 2x [[File: Divine Orb inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Divine Orb|Divine Orb]][[File: Divine Orb inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
The fortunate find
generosity in the divine.

name: The Forward Gaze
reward_html: [[Replica Item]]
flavour_html: "When they realize our true intent, they will decry us, assault us, and try to crush what we have built. We must stand tall, Qotra, and make the future our own."

name: The Fox
reward_html: Level 20 Gem
flavour_html:
"Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."
- Ezomyte Proverb

name: The Fox in the Brambles
reward_html:
[[File: Bramblejack inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Bramblejack|Bramblejack]][[File: Bramblejack inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Hemmingsworth 6:10 - "And the fox gazed out from the brambles, unreachable and smirking."

name: The Gambler
reward_html: [[Divination Card]]
flavour_html: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

name: The Garish Power
reward_html: [[Jewel]]
flavour_html: Maligaro may have valued function over form, but that did not mute his flair for the dramatic.

name: The Gemcutter
reward_html: [[File: Gemcutter's Prism inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Gemcutter's Prism|Gemcutter's Prism]][[File: Gemcutter's Prism inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: In the hands of a master craftsman, a worthless pebble can adorn the crown of a king.

name: The Gentleman
reward_html:
Sword
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: "Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"

name: The Gladiator
reward_html: [[File: Nightmare Bascinet inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Nightmare Bascinet|Nightmare Bascinet]][[File: Nightmare Bascinet inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

The thumb turns down
and the crowd roars,
they want death
and the blood is yours.

name: The Golden Era

Flaring Eclipse Staff
Item Level: 100

name: The Greatest Intentions

[[File: The Saviour inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[The Saviour|The Saviour]][[File: The Saviour inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Chasing purity in the rising light means facing the darkening edges of the spirit.

reward_html: [[File: Carcass Jack inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Carcass Jack|Carcass Jack]][[File: Carcass Jack inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]

flavour_html: It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

name: The Scout
reward_html: 7x [[File: Exalted Orb inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Exalted Orb|Exalted Orb]][[File: Exalted Orb inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: The first to travel are often rewarded for their journey, but all the treasure in the world cannot bring back those that are lost.

name: The Seeker
reward_html: 3x [[File: Orb of Annulment inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Orb of Annulment|Orb of Annulment]][[File: Orb of Annulment inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: All that is flawed is worthless. The slightest error, and this might as well be trash.

name: The Sephirot
reward_html: 10x [[File: Divine Orb inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Divine Orb|Divine Orb]][[File: Divine Orb inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: If the path to divinity were simple, we'd all be gods.

name: The Shepherd's Sandals
reward_html:
[[Boots]]
Item Level: 100
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: He who watches the flock is himself watched by those with loyalty beyond measure.

name: The Shieldbearer
reward_html: [[File: The Squire inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[The Squire|The Squire]][[File: The Squire inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: While you grow, I shall be your knight, and you my squire. One day, you shall be the one who stands and defends our home.

name: The Shortcut
description: Quicksilver Flask of the CheetahItem Level: 100
reward_html:
Quicksilver Flask of the Cheetah
Item Level: 100
flavour_html: If time is the most valuable currency, how do you make more of it?

name: The Side Quest
reward_html: 20x Scouting Report
flavour_html: You'll never know the things you miss if you keep your eyes closed

name: The Sigil
reward_html: Unassailable Amulet
flavour_html:
Three men travel
through the gate;
they carry a protective ward.
A faction conspires
against their fate,
but magic unravels the sword.

name: The Siren
reward_html:
[[File: The Whispering Ice inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[The Whispering Ice|The Whispering Ice]][[File: The Whispering Ice inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
At the beck and call
of The Siren's hand,
winter ravages
the trembling land,
and the weight of ice that binds
will break the strongest of minds.

name: The Skeleton
reward_html:
Level 1 Summon Skeletons
Quality: +23%
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: They stand among us, and within us.

name: The Soul
reward_html: [[File: Soul Taker inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Soul Taker|Soul Taker]][[File: Soul Taker inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

name: The Spark and the Flame
reward_html: [[File: Berek's Respite inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Berek's Respite|Berek's Respite]][[File: Berek's Respite inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: When sky meets ground the flames can be found, but who has the will to tame them.

name: The Spoiled Prince
reward_html:
Dictator's Prophecy Wand
Item Level: 100
flavour_html: A boy who grows up with everything learns to appreciate nothing.

name: The Standoff
reward_html: [[File: Rustic Sash inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Rustic Sash|Rustic Sash]][[File: Rustic Sash inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Sometimes your greatest enemy is the only one keeping you breathing.

name: The Stormcaller
reward_html: Agnerod Staff
flavour_html:
If you beckon the
Lord of Lightning,
do not be surprised
when you are struck.

name: The Strategist
reward_html:
[[File: Inspired Learning inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Inspired Learning|Inspired Learning]][[File: Inspired Learning inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Know thine enemy better than you know thyself.

name: The Summoner
reward_html:
Minion Gem
Quality: +20%
flavour_html: To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.

name: The Sun
reward_html: [[File: Rise of the Phoenix inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Rise of the Phoenix|Rise of the Phoenix]][[File: Rise of the Phoenix inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Each night, the light dies, and each morning she is born anew, embracing the land in her golden wings.

name: The Surgeon
reward_html: Surgeon's Flask
flavour_html:
"He might be lacking in vision, but his virtuosity is undeniable."
- Malachai, on Maligaro

name: The Surveyor
reward_html:
[[Map]]
Map Tier: 14
flavour_html: Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

name: The Survivalist
reward_html: 7x [[File: Orb of Alchemy inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Orb of Alchemy|Orb of Alchemy]][[File: Orb of Alchemy inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
A lucky number
For us all
To help us through
The perils told.

name: The Sword King's Salute
reward_html: [[File: Daresso's Salute inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Daresso's Salute|Daresso's Salute]][[File: Daresso's Salute inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
Many were slain by the sword king
Their blood decorating his ring
Those who retreated were slaughtered
Those who fought bravely were honoured

name: The Thaumaturgist
reward_html:
[[File: Shavronne's Revelation inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Shavronne's Revelation|Shavronne's Revelation]][[File: Shavronne's Revelation inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
"Mastery of thaumaturgy is like any other pursuit; it requires dedication and sacrifice. Sometimes several sacrifices."
- Shavronne of Umbra

name: The Throne
reward_html:
[[File: Kaom's Roots inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Kaom's Roots|Kaom's Roots]][[File: Kaom's Roots inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: A king's movement is unwavering.

name: The Tinkerer's Table
reward_html: 5x Fossil
flavour_html: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

name: The Tireless Extractor
reward_html: 10x Oil
flavour_html:
"I am not alone in this. I have God by my side! And... you help sometimes, I suppose."
- Sister Cassia

name: The Tower
reward_html: [[Staff]]
flavour_html: A tower built of the strongest stone is not eternal; a towering intellect is not enlightened.

name: The Traitor
reward_html:
[[Wand]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
Sometimes an apprentice becomes a master through countless hours of hard work and practice.
Sometimes it happens by force.

name: The Transformation
reward_html: [[File: Tainted Mythic Orb inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Tainted Mythic Orb|Tainted Mythic Orb]][[File: Tainted Mythic Orb inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Even the most beautiful of transformations can still have a dark side.

name: The Trial
reward_html:
[[Map]]
Map Tier: 15
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

name: The Tumbleweed
description: Diamond Ring of RedemptionItem Level: 100Redeemer Item
reward_html:
Diamond Ring of Redemption
Item Level: 100
Redeemer Item
flavour_html: Love is the only redemption after succumbing to the grasps of the Wasteland.

name: The Twilight Moon
reward_html: [[File: The Twilight Temple inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[The Twilight Temple|The Twilight Temple]][[File: The Twilight Temple inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: The day is dying, the night is born, the air grows cool, the sky is torn.

name: The Twins
reward_html:
Gemini Claw of Celebration
Item Level: 83
flavour_html:
Two sides of a coin;
Heads for a friend,
tails a foe;
Gemini toss up

name: The Tyrant
reward_html:
Merciless Weapon
Item Level: 100
flavour_html:
"Fear controls the masses."
- Laszlo, the Scourge

name: The Undaunted
reward_html:
Nemesis Item
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
"Fate was always my nemesis...
But it didn't stop me then, and it won't stop me now."
- Kjetilbrann, The Undaunted

name: The Undisputed
reward_html:
Merciless Vaal Axe
Item Level: 100
Elder Item
flavour_html: To create something truly spectacular, you must risk total failure.

name: The Unexpected Prize
reward_html:
Attribute Transforming Jewel
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
They came from far and wide under a common banner.
They sought companionship and competition,
but found a treasure none had foreseen.

name: The Union
reward_html: 10x [[File: Gemcutter's Prism inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Gemcutter's Prism|Gemcutter's Prism]][[File: Gemcutter's Prism inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
On the 21st of Eterni,
two become one,
their light outshines
the setting sun.

name: The Valkyrie
reward_html: Nemesis Item
flavour_html:
The villain strikes,
the world is torn.
A war begins, a hero is born,
The nemesis sets the sky alight.
A hero's sacrifice
sets everything right.
- Drake's Epitaph

name: The Vast
reward_html: [[File: Song of the Sirens inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Song of the Sirens|Song of the Sirens]][[File: Song of the Sirens inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
Can you hear the siren's calls,
Just beyond the sea?
A voice which hearts
of men enthralls,
I too am hooked to thee.

name: The Visionary
reward_html: [[File: Lioneye's Vision inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Lioneye's Vision|Lioneye's Vision]][[File: Lioneye's Vision inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Lioneye looked to the heights of glorious victory. And thus he missed the defeat right under his nose.

name: The Void
flavour_html: Reach into the Void and claim your prize.

name: The Warden
reward_html:
[[Amulet]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Brutus' first innovation as Lord Incarcerator was a weighted chain around every neck so that his prisoners would forever bow to him.

name: The Warlord
reward_html:
Six-Link Coronal Maul
Item Level: 83
flavour_html:
To cure the Goddess,
and break the chains of corruption,
you must shatter the world.

name: The Watcher
reward_html: [[File: Crown of Eyes inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Crown of Eyes|Crown of Eyes]][[File: Crown of Eyes inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
Strange eyes on top of spines
Gaze beyond the veil of time
Deep down below the mines
A dream of crimson and of grime

name: The Web
reward_html: Weapon of Crafting
flavour_html:
A weapon, a shelter, a prison.
The web's purpose changes
with the spider's needs.
A lesson we should
take to heart.

name: The Wedding Gift
reward_html: [[File: Arakaali's Fang inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Arakaali's Fang|Arakaali's Fang]][[File: Arakaali's Fang inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: The acolytes congratulated the lucky groom for becoming one with the goddess.

name: The White Knight
reward_html:
Six-Link Astral Plate
Item Level: 100
Crusader Item
flavour_html: Where Decay festers, I shall expunge it, and leave in its place a shining monument.

name: The Whiteout
reward_html: [[File: Cospri's Malice inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Cospri's Malice|Cospri's Malice]][[File: Cospri's Malice inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
They thought winter had come early,
that snow blanketed the land,
but in truth, all their chickens
had come home to roost.

name: The Wilted Rose
reward_html:
Level 21 Aura Gem
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Though the path to divinity is fraught with peril, hope may bloom from within.

name: The Wind
reward_html: [[File: Windripper inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Windripper|Windripper]][[File: Windripper inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.

name: The Witch
reward_html: [[File: Kiara's Determination inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Kiara's Determination|Kiara's Determination]][[File: Kiara's Determination inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
A wanderer in the wild strives
Against countless foes he survives
A fool pursues a quest contrived
By the gift of the witch, alive.

name: The Wolf
reward_html: Rigwald Item
flavour_html: The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.

name: The Wolf's Legacy
reward_html: [[File: Vaults of Atziri inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Vaults of Atziri|Vaults of Atziri]][[File: Vaults of Atziri inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: The howls and cackling could not mask the sadness.

name: The Wolf's Shadow
reward_html: [[File: Hyaon's Fury inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Hyaon's Fury|Hyaon's Fury]][[File: Hyaon's Fury inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: "If I fall, we will fall together with my fangs in your throat."

name: The Wolven King's Bite
reward_html: [[File: Rigwald's Quills inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Rigwald's Quills|Rigwald's Quills]][[File: Rigwald's Quills inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: A wolf does not bite his mate as he does his prey, yet both begin with bared teeth. Know who you are, and you will know the meaning of the bite.

name: The Wolverine
reward_html:
[[Claw]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Claw them from the bottom, you'll be glad that you have got 'em, claw them from the top, you'll never want to stop.

name: The World Eater
reward_html: [[File: Starforge inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Starforge|Starforge]][[File: Starforge inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Its body knows no limits. Its appetite knows no bounds.

name: The Wrath
reward_html: 10x [[File: Chaos Orb inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Chaos Orb|Chaos Orb]][[File: Chaos Orb inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: "Daughter of catastrophe, mother of pain. Amongst the filth of Wraeclast, she wanders, and her wrath follows." - Quintoon the Returned

name: The Wretched
reward_html: [[Belt]]
flavour_html: Necromancers, believe me, are more terrifying than their thralls.

name: Thirst for Knowledge
reward_html: [[File: Gluttony inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Gluttony|Gluttony]][[File: Gluttony inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
A ravenous mind can readily take in ideas from any source.
Fortunately for the scholars, he has already learned about sustainability.

name: Three Faces in the Dark
reward_html: 3x [[File: Chaos Orb inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Chaos Orb|Chaos Orb]][[File: Chaos Orb inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: For every threat you spy in the shadows, there are two others you don't.

name: Three Voices
reward_html: 3x Essence
flavour_html: The village elders had a curious rule: If you hear three voices scream for aid, flee as fast as you can.

name: Thunderous Skies
reward_html: [[File: Storm Cloud inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Storm Cloud|Storm Cloud]][[File: Storm Cloud inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Many that have wielded the power of lightning have said that death by electrocution looks like the victim is more alive than ever before.

name: Time-Lost Relic
reward_html: [[League-Specific Item]]
flavour_html: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

name: Toxic Tidings
reward_html:
[[File: Dendrobate inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Dendrobate|Dendrobate]][[File: Dendrobate inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
A beast even Einhar
will not hunt.

name: Tranquillity
reward_html: [[File: Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Voltaxic Rift|Voltaxic Rift]][[File: Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: Beware the sudden calm, for it is a sure sign of a storm on the horizon.

name: Treasure Hunter
reward_html:
[[File: Vaults of Atziri inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Vaults of Atziri|Vaults of Atziri]][[File: Vaults of Atziri inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
"Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."
- Toggo's Last Words

name: Triskaidekaphobia
reward_html:
[[Map]]
Map Tier: 13
Quality: +13%
Delirium: 100%
Modifiers: 8
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: The Mists of Madness prey on those who harbour the deepest of fears.

name: Turn the Other Cheek
reward_html:
[[File: Pacifism inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Pacifism|Pacifism]][[File: Pacifism inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
"Only after one forsakes rage, can true power be found."
- Sekhema Asenath

name: Unchained
reward_html:
[[File: Facebreaker inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Facebreaker|Facebreaker]][[File: Facebreaker inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Two-Implicit]]
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Mold the world with your bare hands. Be careful, for what is your doing might become your undoing.

name: Underground Forest
reward_html: 10x [[File: Grand Eldritch Ichor inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Grand Eldritch Ichor|Grand Eldritch Ichor]][[File: Grand Eldritch Ichor inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: "In the forest again... But at least I have these."

name: Unrequited Love
reward_html: 19x [[File: Mirror Shard inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Mirror Shard|Mirror Shard]][[File: Mirror Shard inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
The pale flame of his heart disappeared in his azure reflection.
The work of a life.
Ambitious, and unfinished.

name: Vanity
reward_html:
[[File: Tabula Rasa inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Tabula Rasa|Tabula Rasa]][[File: Tabula Rasa inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
[[Corrupted]]

name: Vile Power
reward_html: [[File: Doomfletch inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Doomfletch|Doomfletch]][[File: Doomfletch inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html:
Dread and danger
makes the air feel thin.
Above, power slumbers, tempting fate.
Greed and ambition
draws countless in,
For those who seek power
can never wait.

name: Vinia's Token
reward_html: 10x [[File: Orb of Regret inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Orb of Regret|Orb of Regret]][[File: Orb of Regret inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
flavour_html: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.

name: Void of the Elements
reward_html:
Overpowering Opal Ring
Item Level: 100
Elder Item
flavour_html: Though the forces of nature are mighty and intimidating, it is their absence which should be feared.

name: Volatile Power
reward_html:
Vaal Gem
Quality: +20%
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

name: Wealth and Power
reward_html:
Level 4 Enlighten
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth or power he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to positively affect those around him.

name: When Currents Blaze
reward_html:
[[File: Stormfire inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Stormfire|Stormfire]][[File: Stormfire inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
Quality: +20%
[[Corrupted]]
flavour_html:
In their fiery union,
the storm left the rivers
forever changed.

name: Who Asked
reward_html:
Dictator's Weapon
Item Level: 83
[[Fractured]]
flavour_html:
In the midst
of unrelenting requests,
the blacksmith's forge
conjures the unpredictable
Countless voices, countless desires
yielding weapons as diverse
as those who ask

name: Winter's Embrace
reward_html:
[[File: Circle of Fear inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Circle of Fear|Circle of Fear]][[File: Circle of Fear inventory icon.png|78x78px|link=|alt=|class=item-icon]]
Three-Implicit
Synthesised
flavour_html:
Come home to me, my sweet.
Oh, how long you've been!
Lie with me in the frozen dark.
I may yet find forgiveness
Now that fear has left you.
